name: Freeway Redux Plus
description:
(a redux prototype of a game from Activision for the Atari 2600)

This is an add-on to GameMaker Studio tutorial on Youtube.

PLAYER 1:

  • "W" / D-Pad Up / Analog Up to move up
  • "S" / D-Pad Dow / Analog Down to move down
  • "D" / A Button to shoot

PLAYER 2

  • "UP" / D-Pad Up / Analog Up to move up
  • "DOWN" / D-Pad Down / Analog Down to move down
  • "LEFT" / A Button to shoot

OTHER CONTROLS

  • "R" / Select(Back) to restart
  •  "ESC" to exit
  • "+" to increase target score
  • "-" to increase target score 
  • "F1" to toggle to full screen

This is the PLUS version with the following added features;

  1. Updated graphics
  2. Controller support
  3. Full screen support

***note: the car assets were purchased.
